Not sure where this bug belongs, but on reviewing my log file from using
I20050610-0010 on GTK+/x86-64, I found this exception and many like it:

Billy, could you provide the full stack trace (all frames)?

An NPE can only happen here if a null parameter has been passed in.  Moving to
team, which is where the arguments are coming from.

Sorry, I moved to team too soon.  It looks like TeamAction is getting a
selection array with a null entry.  I don't think it can be seen from the stack
what part is being deactivated and what part is being activated.  Billy, if you
are able to observe what part selection changes cause the NPE to be logged, it
might provide some insight...
I have so far been unable to reproduce this again.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 99996 ***
